tool_description: Generates quotes from the movies within the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Includes quotes from Wanda Maximoff, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, and Thor.
title: Marvel-Quote-API

api_list.name: Get Quotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://marvel-quote-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marvel-quote-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
